name: Fisherman Sam
description:
It’s just another day for Fisherman Sam until he finds himself being sucked into a whirlpool that leads to a secret underwater base occupied by diabolical fish. Join Sam in this 3D Action Adventure to escape the base and return to the surface before he becomes fish food!

Controls (Keyboard)
WASD format
Space-bar: Jump
Right-Click : Spin Attack
Left-Click: Grapple
O: Enter door
Esc - pause
Enter: next dialogue
Backspace : Skip Dialogue

U: Reset Best Time
Z: Hide Timer
F1: Quick loads the main menu
F2: Quick loads level 1
F3: Quick loads level 2
F4: Quick loads level 3
F5: Quick loads level 4
F6: Quick loads level 5
